name: blinko
description: Blinko is a privacy-first, plain text note-taking and publishing tool that organizes content as markdown files. It focuses on fast writing, local storage, and simple publishing, ideal for journals, blogs, and personal portfolios.
features: Plain Text Notes: Write and organize notes in markdown format. Simple and portable.
Privacy-First: Local storage keeps your notes completely private. No cloud dependency.
Fast Writing: Optimized interface for quick note-taking. Minimal friction.
Publishing: Easily publish notes as blogs or portfolios. Share your thoughts.
Markdown Support: Full markdown formatting for rich content. Flexible formatting.
Cross-Platform: Desktop apps for Linux, Windows, macOS, and Android. Write anywhere.
Local Files: Notes stored as plain markdown files. Easy backup and migration.
Lightweight: Fast, responsive performance without bloat. Efficient design.
